title.romaji: Jian Wang 3: Xia Gan Yi Dan Shen Jianxin 2
title.native: 剑网3·侠肝义胆沈剑心 第二季

description: Shen Jianxin, who pulled out the sword of heaven, is full of confidence, and returns to the rivers and lakes when he goes down the mountain. At this time, the Central Plains Wulin is facing an unprecedented crisis. Shen Jianxin was in danger and was ordered to enter the maritime world because of his fetal force and the sword of heaven. He was involved in various plots. During the journey of Shen Jianxin and his party, accidents occurred one after another, and the identity of the mysterious figure was gradually revealed ...
